A obscure Ismaili philosopher-poet and the author of an Ismaili philosophical poem whose questions were the subject of at least two commentaries by the Ismaili thinkers, (1) Nāsir-i Khusraw’s Kitāb jāmiʿ al-ḥikmatayn; (2) Muḥammad Surkh Nayshāpūrī’s Sharḥ-i qaṣīdah-i Abu’l-Haytham Jurjānī.
